name: sacral
neural_correlate: Reproductive system, life force energy center
pressure_type: Energy to work and respond to life

defined_mechanics.description: Consistent life force energy, designed to work

traits: Not designed to work all the time
challenges: Trying to keep up with Generator pace
Not knowing when to stop working
open_mechanics.conditioning: Pressure to work consistently like energy types

somatic_scan_instructions: Feel your gut and pelvis. Notice life force energy or emptiness.
regulation_techniques: Honor that you're not designed for 8 hour work days
Know when to stop before exhaustion

neuroception.safety_signals: Center operating in its correct frequency, no over-identification or conditioning
neuroception.threat_signals: Conditioning patterns active, attempting to be what you're not
